About.Name: Zijie Zheng
About.AboutText:
Hi, I am Jerry Zheng. I'm a computer science student at Seattle Pacific University. I'm interested in learning about software development and exploring new areas that can expand my skills and knowledge as a programmer. Currently learning C++ language with some experience in Java and Python.

While I am still learning, I enjoy seeking out new learning opportunities and my network. I believe that it is vital to apply the skills learned in classrooms to real world programming and teamwork that encourages growth.

Experience.ExperienceText:
I was born in the United States but I am a first generation Chinese immigrant. I did not even know about programming until my 8th grade math class where I learned about Scratch and beginneer game development.

Starting from then, in my high school years, I began to research about what coding really is and took classes that gave me more interest and background knowledge.

Being a student at Seattle Pacific University has been an incredible experience. It has allowed me to continue in my growth as a programmer but also grow in my faith.
Experience.EducationText:
- Experience in programming throughout high school and into university.
- Completed lessons outside of university for Java/Python.
Experience.EmploymentText:
- Working in a team environment.
- Learning different programming skills and communication.
- Teaching children in a respectful and positive space that encourages learning and growth
Experience.SkillsText: Learned C++ and Python in university. Learned Java in high school. Took courses outside of university for both Java and Python.
